H0.text: Muscular and skeletal systems work together to send messages in the human body.

H1.text: Nervous and endocrine are the human body systems that work together to send messages.

H2.text: Excretory and digestive systems work together to send messages.

H3.text: Circulatory and respiratory systems work together to send messages in the human body.

A4.text: The nervous system detects environmental changes that impact the body, then works in tandem with the endocrine system to respond to such events.
